LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.label: Hound charging station
LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging Hound.
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.label: automatroid recharger
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.description: Automatroids can recharge here. During recharge, this recharger produces toxic wastepacks and stores them internally. Haulers must remove the wastepacks from time to time.
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.label: trashbin charging station
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging trashbin.
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.label: verlingbird charging station
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging verlingbird.
